result.title: Problem in 3C ?
result.content:
http://codeforces.com/contest/3/submission/31042409

{ XXX X00 X00 } Isn't it a illegal position of 'X' and '0'es ? Because when one gets 3 marks at a winning position he immediately wins and the game finishes. So how could anyone get this position with 5 'X'?
